"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext" import api from "../services/api" function ClearanceForm() { const { user } = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ reason: "", reason_other: "", }) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState("") const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setError("") try { await api.post("/clearance/submit", formData) alert("Clearance request submitted successfully!") navigate("/student") } catch (error) { setError(error.response?.data?.error || "Failed to submit clearance request") } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (
